name: 10 Seconds of Easter (One Hour Game Jam 103)
name_original: 10 Seconds of Easter (One Hour Game Jam 103)
description:
This is tiny Easter themed game in which you play as the Easter Bunny, collecting as many Easter eggs as you can in just 10 seconds. It was made in under an hour using PICO-8, for the 89nd One Hour Game Jam. If you're interested in how it works, the source code is available.

The theme for this One Hour Game Jam was 'one button'.

Instructions

  • Use the arrow keys to move your and collect as many food pellets as possible.
  • Dodge the fast moving spiders that run across the screen.
  • Try to beat your high score!
